description: two woman at left--one at left with blonde hair, seated, with bare legs, the other standing in profile, with dark hair, looking down, smiling and gesturing to a standing man at right wearing a blue bowler hat, blue Western bow tie and red pants; green and orange geometric shapes at bottom
provenance: [Schmidt Bingham Gallery, New York, sold to Franklin, c. 1987, for $2,500]; Betty L. Beer Franklin, Brookings, S.D., until 2011; given to MIA.
title: Untitled (Man in a Blue Derby)
